name: part_002
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2022】MIX -私の存在証明- 【3DLIVE】 [KyURvb-eIU8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

subtitles.original: ここを独り抗って
subtitles.english: Resisting here alone,

subtitles.original: ずっと独りなんだろうって思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought I'd be alone forever.

subtitles.original: 前だけ睨んで
subtitles.english: Gazing only forward,

subtitles.original: ただ命懸けて
subtitles.english: simply risking my life,

subtitles.original: 足跡見失って
subtitles.english: losing sight of my footsteps.

subtitles.original: 変わらないと
subtitles.english: Knowing things won't change,

subtitles.original: 交わさないと
subtitles.english: knowing we won't interact,

subtitles.original: はぐれ山猫だって笑った
subtitles.english: I laughed at being a stray wildcat.

subtitles.original: 音もなかった世界 満ちて広げてゆく
subtitles.english: Filling and expanding a silent world.

subtitles.original: 人たちの声や生の目に 絆されて
subtitles.english: Enchanted by the voices of people and their living eyes.

subtitles.original: 私は変わりつつ 蕾のライオンです
subtitles.english: I am changing, a lion in the bud.

subtitles.original: 尖った爪を研ぐ 友の前歩くため
subtitles.english: Sharpening my pointed claws to walk before my friends.

subtitles.original: 真っ白い獅子は 群れて群れて群れを抱く
subtitles.english: The pure white lion herds and herds, embracing the pride.

subtitles.original: それが私を支えてくれるから
subtitles.english: Because that is what supports me.

subtitles.original: 誇れる場所を 謳え謳え 飢える者たち
subtitles.english: Sing and sing of this place of pride, you hungry ones.

subtitles.original: WE HAVE THE PRIDE IN
subtitles.english: WE HAVE THE PRIDE IN

subtitles.original: OR IS THE PRIDE
subtitles.english: OR IS THE PRIDE

subtitles.original: それこそは 私の誇り
subtitles.english: That is my pride.

subtitles.original: 蹴ら 飼い殺して 縄張りの
subtitles.english: Kicking... keeping them tamed within the territory,

subtitles.original: 線を 今日も無差別に引いてた
subtitles.english: indiscriminately drawing lines today as well.

subtitles.original: 目指した物だけ 輝く物だけ
subtitles.english: Only the things I aimed for, only the things that shine,

subtitles.original: そして ただ 迷うだけ
subtitles.english: and then, simply getting lost.

subtitles.original: 見失い軌道 噂の元を
subtitles.english: Losing the trajectory, tracing the source of rumors,

subtitles.original: 導き出してる 築いたあの日
subtitles.english: deriving it all since the day I realized.

subtitles.original: 溶けなかった 凍土にやがて広がりゆく
subtitles.english: On the permafrost that wouldn't melt, it eventually spreads.

subtitles.original: 私たちの根っこ 少しずつ 肥えていくから
subtitles.english: Our roots are gradually growing rich.

subtitles.original: 明日をずっと 今日離れていても
subtitles.english: Even if we are far apart today or tomorrow,

subtitles.original: 寂しげに 向け微笑む 友に声届けるため
subtitles.english: to deliver my voice to the friend who smiles lonely at me.

subtitles.original: 一輪の獅子は 咲いて咲いて 咲き誇りたいのさ
subtitles.english: The single lion wants to bloom and bloom in full glory.

subtitles.original: 燃えいづ時は 見守る人のために
subtitles.english: When it burns out, it's for those who watch over us.

subtitles.original: 百歌の王は 一緒に一緒に 咲き誇りたいのさ
subtitles.english: The king of a hundred songs wants to bloom together in glory.

subtitles.original: WE CAN BE THE KING OF BEASTS TOGETHER
subtitles.english: WE CAN BE THE KING OF BEASTS TOGETHER

subtitles.original: 白銀の獅子は 駆けて駆けて 駆け続けてる
subtitles.english: The silver lion runs and runs, continuing to run.

subtitles.original: どこを振り返ることはないから
subtitles.english: Because there's nowhere to look back to.

subtitles.original: 百獣の王は 救世を信じ カラーを名乗るさ
subtitles.english: The king of beasts believes in salvation and shows its colors.

subtitles.original: 今はまだ前だよ
subtitles.english: We're still moving forward.

subtitles.original: この夢だけを
subtitles.english: With only this dream,

subtitles.original: 見て走っていられる
subtitles.english: I can keep on running.

subtitles.original: 後ろに大切なわがたちの 群れの元があるから
subtitles.english: Because behind us lies the foundation of our precious pride.

subtitles.original: WE HAVE THE PRIDE IN
subtitles.english: WE HAVE THE PRIDE IN

subtitles.original: OR IS THE PRIDE
subtitles.english: OR IS THE PRIDE

subtitles.original: それこそは 私の誇り
subtitles.english: That is my pride.

subtitles.original:
High Tide
作詞・作曲・編曲：ZSunder
subtitles.english:
High Tide
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: ZSunder

subtitles.original: When you look up at the night sky, what do you see?
subtitles.english: When you look up at the night sky, what do you see?

subtitles.original: The glowing beauty in the twilight, it's no mystery
subtitles.english: The glowing beauty in the twilight, it's no mystery

subtitles.original: Now watch me at the scene, I'll light it all up
subtitles.english: Now watch me at the scene, I'll light it all up

subtitles.original: When the time has come, I'll be rising high
subtitles.english: When the time has come, I'll be rising high

subtitles.original: Longing for me like a lifeline, whenever you see
subtitles.english: Longing for me like a lifeline, whenever you see

subtitles.original: my shine
subtitles.english: my shine

subtitles.original: I'll catch your eye
subtitles.english: I'll catch your eye
